front.title: Specifications changes for OLS, RJE/RJOR, and SMFS

author.organization: University of California, Santa Barbara (UCSB), Computer Research Lab

abstract.t: The following documents are hereby revised:
1) 'Specifications for Network Use of the UCSB On-Line System [16 October 70, RFC 74, NIC 5417],
(2) 'Network Specifications for Remote Job Entry and Remote Job Output Retrieval at UCSB' [22 March 71, RFC 105, NIC 5775], and
(3) 'Network Specifications for UCSB's Simple-Minded File System' [26 April 71, RFC 122, NIC 5834].
